title: Deep Learning and Cancer Research
description: A few quite exciting applications of deep learning in cancer research have appeared recently. This new algorithm can recognize cancer cells by looking at blood samples without introducing any intrusive chemicals in the process. Amazing results ahead. :) The paper "Deep Learning in Label-free Cell Classification" is available here: http://www.nature.com/articles/srep21471 The link from Healthline: http://www.healthline.com/health/cancer/ovarian-cancer-facts-statistics-infographic#10 Recommended for you: Two+ Minute Papers - Overfitting and Regularization For Deep Learning - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6aF9s...
